ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Service_Option__c, "Express(k)") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Connected_Partner__c, "JPM")) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified") && Eligible_for_Contact_Merge__c = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Express(k) is only available for JPM Leads. Please alter the Lead Source Detail to reflect this.
